mdRecord.dcterms:title: Group of visitors at Home of Washington, Mount Vernon, Va. Members of the Mount Vernon Ladies' Association
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Luke Dillon, Photographer, Washington D. C. Office 935 Penn. Avenue, Pullman's Gallery
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Photograph of 15 women who are members of the Mount Vernon Ladies' Association assembled on the piazza, likely taken during Council in 1884. View includes the south porch and balustrade. Legend can be found on the reverse and includes (left to right): Mrs. Ball, Mrs. Broadwell, Mrs. Eve, Mrs. Sweat; Mrs. Laughton, Mrs. Townsend, Miss Harper; Mrs. Herbert, Mrs. Richardson, Mrs. Walker, Mrs. Washington, Mrs. Chase, Mrs. Comegys, Mrs. Mitchell, and Mrs. Pickens
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon Ladies' Association
